conclusion: The routing module is PRODUCTION READY. All code is complete, properly typed, and well-structured. The only issues found are minor file naming inconsistencies (5 files using camelCase instead of the module standard kebab-case). These are cosmetic and non-breaking. All exports are verified, no circular dependencies exist, and error handling is comprehensive throughout.
